at.irian.ankor.switching.routing

Interface RoutingLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientSocketRoutingLogic, ClientWebSocketRoutingLogic, DefaultServerRoutingLogic

    public interface RoutingLogic
    A RoutingLogic is responsible for finding the appropriate message recipient that is suitable for a given sender and the applied connect parameters.

      • connect

        ModelAddress connect(ModelAddress sender,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> connectParameters)
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress, that requests the new connection
        connectParameters - custom (application specific) parameters
        Returns:
        ModelAddress that accepted the connection request, or null if connection was not accepted
